title: LF some Plat+ players for r5s till diamond+
body:
Yo to keep this short, i am looking for players in the plat ranks to dynamic queue to Diamond and depending how long it takes, we might even get to master.

Comms is a MUST HAVE as dynamic queuing without comms is suicide.
 
other then that i hope to see you on the rift.

Cheers, Mick

replies.body: Add me in game if you want, mattsherona
